Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'Pant... pant... Finally, there you are!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hm? Did you need Nanami for something?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'The leader says there are results from the investigation! Some scavengers found traces of Constructs, come with us!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ah, okay! I'll just go tell Amy about this first!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "Um, didn't you want to finish the mission quickly?"}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: 'Amy... Amy still needs to scavenge with us, you both have missions to complete!'}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "Just... wait until it's over, then you can talk it out, alright?"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Mhm, you have a point! Nanami will wait until it's over then!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Garrison', 3: 'Jazroc tunnel, southern foundation pit. A scavenger saw a Construct there a few days ago.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'The pit is connected to the surface, and so the viral density is higher than underground by a large margin. I can only have someone bring you near the entrance.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "It's here! Ah, wait... I need to wear a helmet first!"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Even though the detection signal's not working, Nanami still smells something fishy here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Mhm... and it's a bit of a party... You better hurry back! And be careful!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'You... have you... found out...?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Just leave it to Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami! Blasting off!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: '...Block off the entrance now?'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'Do it.'}
